InstallationÂ¶

fil_finder has several dependent packages:
  • numpy (>1.7.1)
  • matplotlib
  • astropy (>0.2)
  • scipy
  • skimage (>0.8)
  • networkx
  • pandas
  • OPTIONAL pygraphviz

To install the package, run:

>>> python setup.py install
